extendedInfo.description: NEW!  Introducing Oregon Road Conditions*** For California and Oregon only: more states coming soon ***Road Conditions 1.0 is a free, full featured reference guide to the latest road conditions in the state you select. Quickly find out which roads are safe to travel, are closed, or are having traffic/roadwork issues for which an alternate route would be best. Keep you and your family safe by knowing in advance which roads are safe or dangerous to travel!Key features- Ability to browse or search for a road by state- Visually browse for rest areas- Mark favorite roads for easy referenceDisclaimerOur system updates road condition data from the state's Department of Transportation's website every two minutes.  Road Conditions is intended for informational purposes only, not as a life-saving application.  Use at your own risk.  It is not intended as a replacement for common sense or standard precautions.  Road Conditions and Let There Be Light Innovations assumes no responsibility for damages caused by the use of, the lack of the use of, the unavailability of, or the falsity of the information provided by this application.  Please consult the website of the state you're travelling in for more information about current road conditions and roads safety.Let There Be Light InnovationsRoad Conditions was created by Let There Be Light Innovations.  Please visit online at ltbli.com.  We value your feedback and input.

reviews.title: It does not work!
reviews.comment: I just installed it on my RAZR HD, and every time I open this app it immediately stops working. So I tried re-installing it and still did the same thing.
reviews.author: Brian Chavez

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Update fixed ca or not working. Otherwise very helpful to know about donnors pass when I go through there.
reviews.author: Niccole Cahill

reviews.title: Won\'t open.
reviews.comment: Just downloaded it and every time I try to open it it says it stopped working.
reviews.author: Will Lindsey

reviews.title: Bummer
reviews.comment: It does not work on my Note II
reviews.author: M Myers

reviews.title: Very helpful!
reviews.comment: Love this app! Very useful when traveling!  I can check any road in Ca very quickly! Can\'t wait for more states!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: This would be an EXCELLENT app, if it includes all of the contiguous 48 states. I\'ll pay for something like that!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful App!
reviews.comment: It states right in the app description \"California Only\"... So reviews knocking it for not having other states should be disregarded. The app pulls info right from the CA Dept. of Transportation so it\'s as accurate as it can reliably be. My only qualm is that it doesn\'t use your GPS location to filter highway statuses.. so you have to scroll through all notices to find the one(s) for the area of highway you\'re looking for. It\'s only an issue if there\'s a lot going on for the artery you\'re looking at.
reviews.author: Kati P

reviews.title: Simple interface, informative. Google Maps for rest stops!
reviews.comment: Nice app! Like the maps integration for the rest stops. Suggestions: put a live feed on home screen for last couple extreme events statewide (like closures or chains reqd), also if data is missing like I-80 presently maybe let us know its bc of CalTrans\' site.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t down load.
reviews.comment: Only shows California. Unless your from CA, its useless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Road conditions
reviews.comment: Only gave it 1 star because I had to.  Would not work it kept crashing
reviews.author: Danial Meehan

reviews.title: Wantednca
reviews.comment: I installed it, and it force closed never opened. I\'m bummed
reviews.author: Roger Bell

reviews.title: Well done for California
reviews.comment: It\'s great for California.  Please don\'t forget to update and add the other states, at least continental based, and this app will be five stars for certain.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea bad app
reviews.comment: Download the app and it wouldn\'t open up right off the bat it stoped uninstalled the app until they fix the bugs and then I don\'t know if I will put it on the phone I wanted tripcheck but my phone don\'t have that app yet  -10 rating
